name: FFA202
description:
You are a Robot in a AI test program, detroy the other robots to prove you are the best AI !

Tiny FPS : standard control WASD & ZQSD / mouse button left

Theme : Free For All

Rules : Each kill give +1 points and +3 HP 

Game for the game Jam Trijam #202 "3 hours to create a game"

I have used asset from Unity assetstore to speed up the process.

Note : Game is done in very short time, there is some bugs

Timing for the jam :

  • Thursday & Friday : +- 3h : Prepare Unity project, download free packages, think of the concept and ideas, review the documentation for navMesh, found small tuto for simple AI wandering.
  • Saturday : 
    • 15' create the map using prefabs
    • 15' NavMesh setup and AI code (simple wandering) + animator
    • 1h30 Code raycast and AI attack (using part of code from other unfinised projects)
    • 30' Player setup and shooting code
    • 30' Game Manager setup, menu, score, loop : start - play restart
    • 30' Small polish : Playtest to optmise speed of robot move, projectiles, etc ...
    • Total : 3h30
    • + 1h for more polish to found the aming bug without success
  • Sunday :
    • + 40min to replace the fps controller and fix aiming bug

This jam was a great experience! "bug fixing taking time" & I have planned several weapons and small loot etc ... bug it's a game jam :)
